item.title: Report E-2025040394
item.description:
Report E-2025040394

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-15
  • City: COLONIAL HEIGHTS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 15, 2025, one (1) 6-gallon pail of UN1993 was punctured and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. The damaged pail and impacted materials were containerized in two (2) 55-gallon drums.

item.title: Report X-2025041069
item.description:
Report X-2025041069

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-12T03:42:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-09
  • City: DANVILLE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO GLASS BOTTLES OF CIRCUMFERENCE BUFFER B. ONE BOTTLE HAD SHATTERED INSIDE THE PACKAGE COMPLETELY LEAKING THE ENTIRE CONTENTS. THE SECOND BOTTLE REMAINED INTACT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
